name.japanese: インペルダウン - LEVEL6 無限地獄
name.romanized: Inperu Daun - Reberu Shikkusu Mugen Jigoku

description: The lowest and most secure level of Impel Down, known as Eternal Hell. This level houses the world's most dangerous and notorious criminals whose existences have been erased from history. The prisoners are kept in complete darkness and silence, and many have bounties exceeding 100,000,000 berries. Notable prisoners include Portgas D. Ace and Jinbe.

keyEvents.title: Hancock Arrives at Level 6
keyEvents.description: Boa Hancock, accompanied by Magellan and Hannyabal, arrives at Level 6 where Ace and other dangerous criminals are imprisoned.
keyEvents.significance: First appearance of Level 6 in the anime, revealing the deepest and most secure part of Impel Down where the most dangerous criminals are held.

keyEvents.title: Magellan's Hydra Silences Prisoners
keyEvents.description: Magellan uses his Hydra technique to terrorize and silence the rowdy Level 6 prisoners who are calling out to Hancock.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the extreme security measures and power used to control the most dangerous prisoners in the world.

keyEvents.title: Hancock's Secret Message to Ace
keyEvents.description: Hancock uses the distraction of Magellan's Hydra attack to secretly tell Ace that Luffy is coming to save him.
keyEvents.significance: The critical moment where Ace learns of Luffy's infiltration, setting up the emotional core of the Impel Down and Marineford arcs.

statusHistory.reason: Level 6 is operational and housing dangerous prisoners

name.japanese: インペルダウン - LEVEL3 飢餓地獄
name.romanized: Inperu Daun - Reberu Surī Kiga Jigoku

description: Level 3 of Impel Down, known as Starvation Hell. This level is extremely hot due to the heat rising from Level 4's blazing inferno below. Prisoners suffer from both intense heat and severe dehydration. The level is guarded by the Sphinx, a chimera-like creature with a human face and lion body.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Fights Through Level 3
keyEvents.description: Luffy battles prison guards while advancing through Level 3, dodging seastone nets and enduring the intense heat.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Luffy's continued progression through Impel Down's levels as he fights toward Ace.

keyEvents.title: Bon Clay Appears on Level 3
keyEvents.description: Bon Clay reveals himself on Level 3, initially disguised as Zoro, and reunites with Luffy.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Luffy and Bon Clay's pivotal reunion takes place, changing the course of Luffy's journey through Impel Down.

keyEvents.title: Sphinx Attack
keyEvents.description: The Sphinx guardian beast attacks Luffy and Bon Clay on Level 3.
keyEvents.significance: Provides the first combat test for Luffy and Bon Clay working together as a team.

keyEvents.title: Defeat of the Sphinx
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Bon Clay successfully defeat the Sphinx, clearing their path to descend deeper into Impel Down.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the effective teamwork between Luffy and Bon Clay, allowing them to progress toward Level 4 and Level 5.
